text: Ivory from the mighty elephants of Araby, prized across the World for its purity and sheen.
Ivory from the mighty elephants of Araby, prized across the World for its purity and sheen.
Coffee comes from Araby, and has become popular in Tilea and the Empire, both as a drink and as a display of wealth.
